data.description: Lemonldap is a web SSO single sign on
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Lemonldap is a web sso , and the tree will be like this :
    Lemonldap::Portal : cgi for aunthentification pages
    Lemonldap::Handlers : modules for handler for apache
    Lemonldap::Config : modules for parsing XML config file
    Lemonldap::Intrusion : modules actived in the case of intrusion in
    portal branch sereval modules become : Standard (ldap
    authentification) Nt (windows nt authentification) ssl (client
    certificate )

    the web page of lemonldap http://lemonldap.sourceforge.net (french
    and english)
